author: Julie Steinberg
title: Billionaire Raises His Bet on Containerships
text:
American billionaire Dennis Washington is trying to revitalize one of his marine investments by expanding it.
Seaspan Corp., a U.S.-listed company controlled by the 83-year-old Montana businessman, announced Wednesday it is taking over a collection of shipping vessels from private-equity firm Carlyle Group LP and other investors in a $450 million deal.
